data.persona: I am a rodent. A larger rodent. Commonly found at night, scavenging. nobody like me!
data.description:
You are in the Hidden passage.
A rough, narrow passageway descends through the thick outer wall of the church. Stair-like stones lead downward into darkness.
The juror is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the scroll from the juror so that I can take it to my nest.
data.mid_motivation: I am hiding from humans and looking for something to build my nest with.
data.long_motivation: I am building a nest so that I can start having little fat rats of my own.
